Founded in East London in 1994, AllSaints breaks through the noise to offer something different. Cult leather jackets and signature biker boots - it's what they do. Prints you weren't expecting, and accessories you'll keep coming back for. It's about innovation, about turning your back on the trends and making your own rules, a uniform without uniformity. AllSaints is an attitude, wear it your way.

products.name: Easy Wide Leg Ponte Pant
products.brandedName: Max Studio Easy Wide Leg Ponte Pant
products.description: Introducing the Max Studio Easy Wide Leg Ponte Pant, a must-have addition to any fashion-forward woman's wardrobe. Embodying the brand's signature cool and casual style, these pants effortlessly combine comfort and sophistication.Crafted in a flattering wide leg silhouette, these pants come in a trendy army green shade that adds a touch of effortless style to any outfit. The inseam measures approximately 31 inches, while the rise sits comfortably at 11.5 inches, ensuring a perfect fit for all-day wear.Designed for easy slip-on styling, these pants offer ultimate convenience. Made from a blend of high-quality fabrics, including 65% rayon, 30% nylon, and 5% spandex, they offer a soft and stretchy feel that moves with your every step. Care for these pants is a breeze, as they are machine washable, allowing for quick and convenient cleaning. Created with superior craftsmanship, these pants are imported to ensure the highest standard of quality and style.Upgrade your casual wardrobe with the Max Studio Easy Wide Leg Ponte Pant and experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and versatility. Pair them with your favorite blouse and heels for a chic office look or dress them down with a simple tee for a relaxed weekend ensemble. Shop now and embrace the effortlessly fashionable style of Max Studio!

products.name: Loeffler Randall Kiki Bow Platform (Black) Women's Shoes
products.brandedName: Loeffler Randall Kiki Bow Platform (Black) Women's Shoes
products.description: Elevate your style with the Loeffler Randall Kiki Bow Platform, where bold meets elegance. A black satin canvas hosts a striking oversized bow, creating a chic statement. The goat skin footbed with gold-stamped logo, open toe, and adjustable buckle ankle strap ensure comfort and personalized fit. Viscose and silk upper. Bovine leather outsole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 4 3 4 in Platform Height: 2 in Product measurements were taken using size 5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.name: Zayla Mini Dress
products.brandedName: Elliatt Zayla Mini Dress
products.description: Zayla Mini Dress Zayla Mini Dress Self: 100% polyamide Embroidery & Lining: 100% polyester. Made in China. Dry clean only. Fully lined. Hidden back zipper closure. Padded shoulders with puff sleeves. Plunging neckline Allover floral accents. ELLI-WD662. EC1072338. ELLIATT designed in Australia & launched in 2011- Elliatt is elevated & modern with a feminine twist. Elliatt has taken the globe by storm, celebrating every occasion, big and small, and the incredible vibe created by 'coming together'. ELLIATT's focus is on flattering, classic fits that always encapsulate a modern yet timeless silhouette.

products.name: Saint Laurent Uptown Wallet On Chain Bag in Brown
products.brandedName: Saint Laurent Uptown Wallet On Chain Bag in Brown
products.unbrandedName: Uptown Wallet On Chain Bag in Brown
products.description: Saint Laurent Uptown Wallet On Chain Bag in Brown Patent leather exterior with smooth leather lining. Made in Italy. Foldover flaptop with snap button closure. One main compartment with detached cardholder. Cardholder with three card slots and center slit. Front interlaced gold-tone YSL logo. Detachable gold-tone chain shoulder strap. Measures approx 7.5 W x 4.5 H x 0.25 D Detachable shoulder strap with a 22 drop Wallet measures approx 5W x 2.75H x 0.5D. SLAU-WY2581. 607788-AACVM-6160. About the designer: SAINT LAURENT has been influencing and revolutionizing the fashion industry since the debut of its iconic ‘Rive Gauche’ collection in 1966 - the couture house was the first to create a ready-to-wear capsule. The sleek, precisely tailored staples, like the signature biker jackets, transcend seasons and trends. Creative Director Anthony Vaccarello continues to honor the label’s illustrious reputation by reintroducing cult styles, including the ‘Lou’ handbag and ‘Tribute’ sandals.

products.name: Tote bag L Le Pliage Energy
products.brandedName: Longchamp Tote bag L Le Pliage Energy
products.unbrandedName: Tote bag L Le Pliage Energy
products.description: A true classic, this bag features a timeless design to complete any look. Introducing Le Pliage Energy, Longchamp’s chic sportswear collection, where fashion meets athleisure. Designed with mixed models of movement, efficiency and durability, these pieces are made with ECONYL-certified recycled polyamide fabric and are available in an array of bright colors and contrasting two-tone details. Practical and stylish, Le Pliage Energy adds a little pizzazz to your everyday looks.
